sentences.en: a policy of no concessions to terrorists
sentences.cn: 对恐怖分子决不让步的政策

sentences.en: As a concession to his reasonable demand, the doctor allowed him to work.
sentences.cn: 医生向他的合理要求让步了, 允许他工作.

sentences.en: At last, their company obtained the mining concession.
sentences.cn: 他们的公司最终获得了采矿权.

sentences.en: But this was a formidable concession.
sentences.cn: 但是,这已经是骇人听闻的让步了.

sentences.en: He made no concessions to fashion.
sentences.cn: 他从不迎合时尚。

sentences.en: He took off his jacket as a concession to the heat.
sentences.cn: 因为气温高，他只好脱掉了夹克衫。

sentences.en: I can not make concession which is outside the regulation.
sentences.cn: 我不能作出越规的让步.

sentences.en: I put them in good humour by this concession.
sentences.cn: 我作出些让步,使他们高兴起来.

sentences.en: It must be understood that this concession is made without prejudice to any future decision of the committee.
sentences.cn: 必须明确,这次合作的让步对本委员会今后的决定不产生任何影响.

sentences.en: It was the largest concession to necessity he felt like making.
sentences.cn: 这是他在万不得已的情况下所能作出的最大让步了.

sentences.en: Naturally, there should be mutual concession and there should be reciprocity.
sentences.cn: 自然, 双方都要作些让步,并且要礼尚往来.

sentences.en: That is a great concession.
sentences.cn: 这是很大的让步.

sentences.en: The British were not prepared to make any concessions .
sentences.cn: 英国人没有打算作出让步。

sentences.en: The British were not prepared to make any concessions.
sentences.cn: 英国人没有打算作出让步。

sentences.en: The French company's concession would expire in 1904.
sentences.cn: 法国公司的特许权将于1904年满期.

sentences.en: the import/export concessions that had been granted to the island
sentences.cn: 同意给该岛的进出口特许权

sentences.en: There are other concession to agriculture, forestry and small businesses.
sentences.cn: 对农业 、 林业及小企业也给予其它优惠.

sentences.en: This apparent concession was undermined by two serious qualifications.
sentences.cn: 法院这种明显的退让却被两个严重的限制抵消了.

sentences.en: To reach agreement, both side must make concession.
sentences.cn: 为达成协议，两方都必须做让步。

sentences.en: We can not make heavy concession to the matter.
sentences.cn: 我们在这个问题上不能过于让步.

sentences.en: We must make some concession to the weakness of old age.
sentences.cn: 我们要向老年虚弱者让步.

phrases.tran_cn: 特许经营权合约；租让制合同

trans.tran_en: something that you allow someone to have in order to end an argument or a disagreement
